    • reorderTrack

      public String reorderTrack(String id, int range_start, int insert_before, String snapshot) throws FatalRequestResponse
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the playlist you wish to modify.
      range_start - The index of the first song you wish to reorder.
      insert_before - The index at which you want to insert the tracks to reorder.
      snapshot - The current snapshot you wish to modify.
      Returns:
      The new snapshot id returned by Spotify.
      Throws:
      FatalRequestResponse
